# Card Body

## Usage:

```html
<p-card-body>
    <!-- Content -->
</p-card-body>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                  | Type      | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `inheritText` | `inherit-text` | Wether the button should inherit text styles | `boolean` | `false` |
